# NWProtocolTCP.Metadata

**Class**

A handle you can use to inspect a connection’s TCP state.

## Declaration

```swift
class Metadata
```

## Inspecting TCP State

- **availableSendBuffer**: The number of available bytes in the TCP send buffer.
- **availableReceiveBuffer**: The number of available bytes in the TCP receive buffer.

## Inherits From

- NWProtocolMetadata

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The number of available bytes in the TCP send buffer.
items.name: availableSendBuffer

items.description: The number of available bytes in the TCP receive buffer.
items.name: availableReceiveBuffer
